meanings.definition: The act of celebrating or having a good time.
meanings.sent1: The jollification at the birthday party was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent2: We all joined in the jollification when our team won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The jollification at the picnic made everyone smile and dance.
meanings.sent4: The jollification of the New Year's Eve fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: Her wedding was a jollification to remember with music and dancing.

meanings.sent1: The jollification in the park included games and delicious food.
meanings.sent2: We decorated the backyard for the jollification in honor of our friend's promotion.
meanings.sent3: The jollification in the town square brought the community together for a night of fun.
meanings.sent4: The jollification of the carnival was a whirlwind of colors and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The jollification of the family reunion was a joyful reunion of loved ones.
